aircraft.value: Wasp Interceptor - AC-8165-887 at Sector West Station

defect_observed.value: Radar display intermittent blanking. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 17/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 18/10/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 22/10/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 22/10/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 22/10/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
